import React, { useState } from "react" import { Button, Col, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import Message from "../../components/message/Message" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import "./createProduct.scss" const CreateProduct = ({ history }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [productInfo, changeProductInfo] = useState({ name: "", price: "", image: "", brand: "", description: "", countInStuck: "", }) const { name, price, image, brand, description, countInStuck } = productInfo const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(createNewProduct({name, price, image, brand, description, countInStuck})) } const productInfoOnChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target changeProductInfo((preval) => { return { ...preval, [name]: value, } }) } return (

create new product
